Name: Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome type 1
Definition: An Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the homeobox transcription factor gene PITX2 on chromosome 4q25.

Name: Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome type 2
Definition: An Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome that has_material_basis_in deletions in the region 13q14.

Name: Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome type 3
Definition: An Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the FOXC1 gene on chromosome 6p25.
